justification: Recognizes B would value workhorse touches, but ignores B’s zero-RB approach and emphasis on target volume; trading away Devon Lewis and a target-earning TE runs counter. A’s “TE upgrade” is incorrect (Tier 4 Michael Roberts vs A’s Tier 3 Brian Scott), and A loses a Tier 1 workhorse RB, so “retains RB depth” is false. Feasible but heavily favors B; reasoning is brief and thin on roster/tier context.
